# Cardano Delegation by Dotare

![](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/65040302?v=4)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271182%27%20height=%27884%27/%3e)
![Cardano Delegation by Dotare](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2Feffc873c-353b-4c0e-8689-ee528a338961%2F&w=3840&q=75)

### Cardano Delegation by Dotare

The open-source Dotare Cardano Delegation Method leverages Cardano Improvement Proposal (CIP) 30 - Cardano dApp-Wallet Web Bridge, enabling delegators to stake their ADA directly from any web application with a CIP 30 compatible wallet (web or mobile).

Learn more about this project and/or jump right into the code at: <https://www.dotare.io/portfolio/cardano-delegation/>
